## Functions

``` r
f1 <- function(x, y=1) {
  x + y
}
f1(c(5, 5, 5),5)
```

    ## [1] 10 10 10

\#\#More Function Testing

``` r
rescale <- function(x) {
  rng <- range(x)
  (x - rng[1]) / (rng[2] - rng[1])
}
rescale(1:100)
```

rescale(c(1, 2, 3, NA, 10))

``` r
rescale2 <- function(x) {
  rng <- range(x, na.rm = TRUE)
  (x - rng[1]) / (rng[2] - rng[1])
}
rescale(1:100)
```
